description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期负责管辖广东省的二级法院，是广东省高级人民法院的前身。
description.en: The second-instance court responsible for Guangdong Province during the period of the Republic of China on the mainland, and the predecessor of the Guangdong High People's Court.

relationships.source: 张海波 (1964年)
张海波 (1964年)

description.zh-cn: 张海波的衔级为二级大法官。
description.en: Zhang Haibo holds the rank of Second Grand Justice.

relationships.source: 广东省高级人民法院
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

description.zh-cn: 广东省高级人民法院是中华人民共和国最高人民法院的下级法院，业务上受其领导，并可向其上诉。
description.en: The Guangdong High People's Court is subordinate to the Supreme People's Court, receiving its professional guidance and serving as an appellate court to it.

relationships.source: 广东省高级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 广东省高级人民法院的组织上级是广东省人民代表大会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Guangdong High People's Court is the Guangdong Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.source: 广东省高级人民法院
relationships.target: 广东省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 广东省高级人民法院的组织上级是广东省人民代表大会常务委员会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Guangdong High People's Court is the Standing Committee of the Guangdong Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党广东省高级人民法院党组
relationships.target: 中国共产党广东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省高级人民法院党组是中国共产党广东省委员会的下级党组织。
description.en: The Party Leadership Group of the Guangdong High People's Court is a subordinate party organization of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 广东省高级人民法院
relationships.target: 中国共产党广东省高级人民法院党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省高级人民法院党组是中国共产党在广东省高级人民法院中设立的领导机构。
description.en: The Party Leadership Group of the Guangdong High People's Court is the leading party organization established by the Communist Party of China within the court.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法是广东省高级人民法院的授权法源。
description.en: The Constitution of the People's Republic of China is the authorizing legal source for the Guangdong High People's Court.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法是广东省高级人民法院的组织法规。
description.en: The Organic Law of the People's Courts of the People's Republic of China is the organizational law for the Guangdong High People's Court.

relationships.source: 吕伯涛
郑鄂
龚稼立
广东省高级人民法院
relationships.target: 王老吉与加多宝红罐包装装潢案

description.zh-cn: 广东省高级人民法院对王老吉与加多宝红罐包装装潢案进行了一审。
description.en: The Guangdong High People's Court conducted the first-instance trial of the Wong Lo Kat vs. JDB red can packaging and decoration case.

relationships.source: 王老吉

description.zh-cn: 因红罐包装装潢案与加多宝发生法律诉讼。
description.en: Engaged in a legal dispute with JDB Group over the red can packaging and decoration case.

relationships.source: 广州医药集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 因红罐包装装潢案与加多宝发生法律诉讼。
description.en: Engaged in a legal dispute with JDB Group over the red can packaging and decoration case.

relationships.source: 王老吉与加多宝红罐包装装潢案

description.zh-cn: 加多宝在一审中败诉。
description.en: JDB Group lost the case in the first-instance trial.

relationships.source: 王老吉与加多宝红罐包装装潢案

description.zh-cn: 王老吉在一审中胜诉。
description.en: Wong Lo Kat won the case in the first-instance trial.
